title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P ends lower as Apple weighs, trade tensions ease
text:
US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P ends lower as Apple weighs, trade tensions ease

Stock Markets 5 hours ago (Sep 13, 2019 22:20)

© Reuters. US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P ends lower as Apple weighs, trade tensions ease Sept 13 (Reuters) - The S&P 500 ended the day down slightly but less than 1% below its all-time high as a drop in Apple stock countered easing U.S.-China trade tensions. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 37.07 points, or 0.14%, to 27,219.52, the S&P 500 lost 2.18 points, or 0.07%, to 3,007.39 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 17.75 points, or 0.22%, to 8,176.71.

US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P ends lower as Apple weighs, trade tensions ease
description: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P ends lower as Apple weighs, trade tensions ease
